level.heading: Ineligibility for inclusion on prequalified lists.
level.text: ยง 26-905 Ineligibility for inclusion on prequalified lists. a. In addition to any other penalty provided by law, any contractor or subcontractor who fails to provide wage reporting information in accordance with section 26-904 of this chapter shall be ineligible to be included on a prequalified list of contractors and subcontractors. b. In addition to any other penalty provided by law, any contractor or subcontractor with a history of construction conditions, as determined by the department, shall be ineligible to be included on a prequalified list of contractors and subcontractors.
